VersionInfo.Title: Markdown Monster 3.0.0.32 (Preview) is now available
VersionInfo.Detail:
This **Preview Release** adds a number of enhancements:
* Runs on .NET 7.0 * New GitHub Dark and updated GitHub Preview Themes * Updated Light Mode Application Theme * Many new Markup Operations * Improved Multiline Markup Support * Weblog New Posts Folder for Drafts * Improved Html and PDF Exports * Customizable External Programs Support * plus [much more...](https://github.com/RickStrahl/MarkdownMonster/blob/main/Changelog.md)
<small>**Note:** v3 is an [upgrade from v2](https://markdownmonster.west-wind.com/purchase#upgrades). Current licenses for v2 will work on v3 *during the Preview phase*. </small>
